welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Herent, a charming city in Belgium known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the wonders this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
